column5: First big adventure of the year. Hitting another new section of park this year – the northwest corner. Going in Beaverhouse / Quetico / Jean / Sturgeon / Dore’ / Pickerel coming out in Stanton Bay thanks to my good friend Doug at Quetico Outfitters  The first three lakes will be all new ones would be nice to catch lakers in all 6 but my personal over / under is 3. Pictures and story’s in June
